- **Commit:** [`ff6577a`](https://github.com/enufacas/Chained/commit/ff6577a914f4afcd05f6c6dbc96ba58c8b2395b5)
- **Failed At:** 2025-11-10T04:25:24Z

### Actions Required
1. Review the [failed workflow run](https://github.com/enufacas/Chained/actions/runs/19220597295)
2. Check the logs for error messages
3. Identify the root cause of the failure
4. Fix the issue and re-run the workflow if needed
5. Close this issue once the problem is resolved
